events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request following the customer's message about wanting their money back.
An agent specializing in refund cases has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent purchase. I am here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket so we can process your refund accurately?
My order number is 789456123, and the jacket is unused with all tags still attached, as I only tried it on once.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process for your jacket. Please send the item back within 7 days using the pre-paid return label we will email shortly.
Thank you for the prompt response! I appreciate the quick solution and will ship the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received the refund without any issues. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since your refund was completed successfully and no further issues were reported, we are closing the case now. Thank you for choosing our service.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
